_sText:
Yeah!
My version of the great surf_japan_ptad.
I've added:
- New Industrial Theme
- Naughts And Crosses
- Turned the end of the level onto itself
- 3D skybox
- Pit of "DEATH"
- Jail
- Widened the skybox
- Different secrets/traps
- Laser pits
- Hiding spots
- Pro and Hard Sections (pretty easy :D)
- TOP platform
- Changed Weapon Positions slightly
- Changed the Bombsite
- Added bombsite cameras
- Added a "Tool Box"

Have fun :D

Known Bugs:
-If one person tries operating O's and X's it will glitch, and not reset for some reason.
